text: Ivo Georgiev (; 12 May 1972 – 13 November 2021) was a Bulgarian professional footballer. He played as a forward. Georgiev played for Volov Shumen, Debreceni VSC, Korabostroitel, Spartak Varna, FC Aarau, Levski Sofia, SV Waldhof Mannheim, Dobrudzha, Budapest Honvéd and Botev Vratsa. Georgiev died from heart failure on 13 November 2021, at the age of 49. ==References== Category:1972 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Bulgarian footballers Category:Deaths from heart failure Category:Sportspeople from Sofia Category:Bulgaria at UEFA Euro 1996
title: Ivo Georgiev
